title: U.S. shoots down Iranian drone that approached aircraft carrier
summary_full: Officials said the aircraft was “acting aggressively” when it approached the USS Abraham Lincoln, which is in the Middle East amid tensions between Washington and Tehran.
summary_public: Officials said the aircraft was “acting aggressively” when it approached the USS Abraham Lincoln, which is in the Middle East amid tensions between Washington and Tehran.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Iranian drone that approached aircraft carrier... “acting aggressively”
